answers.author: Josephine Valencia
answers.text:
San Antonio TX generally does not allow links to private vendors unless there is a specific joint project or contract that the City is involved with.   Greensboro NC allows sponsors of special events to be mentioned on the City website but will not provide a link to them.  
Durham NC allows links in limited circumstances.   It has to be for a service/product that the City frequently gets requests for, but is not actually provided by the City.   Several years ago they provided links to compost bins and rain barrels from private companies.   Those links were removed when the City started selling the same products.  They will only provide a link if there is more than one company that can be identified and listed.  The list must also have instructions on how a non-listed vendors can be added to the list.
